description:
Updates:

Get your ideal job. Grab that promotion. Stand out by learning in-demand SAP tech skills from the best.

Course fully updated for 2015.

This course now includes 4 hours HD training videos with both lecture & demo, pages of 10 further readings plus 3 bonus documents, and appendices for SAP niches - enabling you to boost SAP career.

User reviews:

"Definitely I would recommend to any one, Best of the SAP Basis Course in Udemy."

"I enjoyed my time with Simon. I took this basis course because I wanted to be a capable basis team member."

SAP is a multinational software corporation that makes enterprise software to manage business operations. More than 80% of fortune 500 companies have successfully implemented SAP products. SAP was named the most valuable brand in Europe with a value of over 33 billion euros in 2015.

SAP Basis team is dealing with managing, configuring, monitoring, troubleshooting SAP system. It's a very important part of every organization. They're not only a major cost. They determine the performance of an organization IT system. Still, many organizations and IT managers don't do a very good job of SAP basis. This isn't because of a lack of knowledge. It's because of a lack of education in applying what we know works.

According to a pay scale study, an SAP consultant earns an average salary of $120,000 per year!

Welcome to the SAP Basis 101.

SAP Basis 101 is an introductory course for SAP beginners seeking to improve their Basis skills. Throughout the course we will cover techniques used by consulting partnerships throughout the world. We're about to start an exciting journey into SAP Basis, and we even include further readings, bonus documents, life-time support and appendices for SAP niches - enabling you to boost your SAP career.

SAP Basis 101 topics are covered with a mixture of video lectures and workbooks:

  • Basis Fundamental
  • Starting and Stopping SAP
  • System Configuration
  • System Monitoring and Troubleshooting
  • Database Fundamentals
  • User Administration
  • Schedule Background Task
  • Output Management
  • System maintenance
  • Remote Function Call

In this course, you'll stretch your SAP business knowledge, Basis technical skills and entrepreneur thinking.

Every minute you delay is actually COSTING you money.

Enroll today. We'll help you succeed and land your dream job.
title: SAP Basis Essentials - Become a Great SAP Basis Consultant
